ee minissunta kamathi andumak adinna ayithiya thiyenawa.adutharamin ee gana katha karannawath kisima kenekuta ba.me lipiye pala kala chayarupath muslimwarunge hitha ridena eewa.me lipiyanam muslim wirodhi witharak noweyi bauddha wirodhi ekak.hamotama thamange sanskruthiya bhukthi widinna ayithiya thiyenna oona.muslimwarunta witharak noweyi hamuduruwaruntath hasirena widiya gana mathalangen upades ganna eka prayogika nane.aagamwalata apahasa karanna mathalanta kisima ayithiyak na.eeka thadinma hithethabaganna.me kiyanne tharahakata noweyi.oba samahara lipi wala simawa ikmawa yanawa.katholikayange hitha ridena lipiyakuth pala karala thibuna.yahapath purudu igena ganna thawa pramada na.koheda iskole giye royal ekatada?
